## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(12.93, 10.71)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electricity group (position 12.93, 10.71)

### Copper plate mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5)

### Iron plate mine at position(-15.5, -50.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -15.5, -50.5)

### Stone furnace factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### Lab at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 10.5, 10.5)

### Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 5.5, 0.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to get an entity that does not exist
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to access is present at the specified position. Double-check the coordinates and the type of entity.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities that may block placement.

### Errors related to power supply
- Ensure that all entities requiring power are connected to an electric network and have a sufficient power supply to operate.
